alert.note: Alert for Pribilof Islands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 13 at 3:43PM AKST until February 14 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. Visibilities reduced to one quarter mile or less. * WHERE...Pribilof Islands. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on very difficult travel conditions, with whiteout conditions at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and gusty northeasterly winds are expected to continue to bring blizzard conditions to the Pribilof Islands this evening. Strong winds and snowfall wrapping around the north side of the low will keep the Pribilof Islands in persistent blizzard conditions into Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel very hazardous. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle.
